titles.title: In The Cross Of Christ I Glory (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the cross of Christ I glory Tow'ring o'er the wrecks of time All the light of sacred story Gathers round its head sublime{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the woes of life o'ertake me Hopes deceive and fears annoy Never shall the cross forsake me Lo it glows with peace and joy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the sun of bliss is beaming Light and love upon my way From the cross the radiance streaming Adds more luster to the day{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bane and blessing pain and pleasure By the cross are sanctified Peace is there that knows no measure Joys that through all time abide{/lang-eng}
